title: un nAmam
sahitya:
un nAmam uraittAlE pOdum ulaginil uyya vazhi tEDum uttamar urugi urugi


anupallavi

  pain-nAgap-pAi tanil paLLI koL paramanE ennALum unnUru idayamtanil vaittu


caraNam    karitanukkudaviya karuttuyar nAmam kanni mAnam kAtta kannal tirunAmam
 kAshiyil haran upadEshikkum nAmam kaliyinil mukti nalgiDum nAmam
